channel.title: CVE Feed for CleanTalk -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CleanTalk -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-28221|2024-08-03T05:48:37.588Z -- cleantalk -- cleantalk%20antispam
item.description: The CleanTalk AntiSpam plugin <= 5.173 for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) via the $_REQUEST['page'] parameter in`/lib/Cleantalk/ApbctWP/FindSpam/ListTable/Comments.php`

item.title: CVE-2022-28222|2024-08-03T05:48:37.545Z -- cleantalk -- cleantalk%20antispam
item.description: The CleanTalk AntiSpam plugin <= 5.173 for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) via the $_REQUEST['page'] parameter in`/lib/Cleantalk/ApbctWP/FindSpam/ListTable/Users.php`
